title: Teemo <3
body:
Is there a way to get all the teemo icons ? I am willing to do anything for them ! I am a huge fan of teemo. Riot please be open minded. 

p.s. <3 teemo

p.p.s. Do you love teemo ?

replies.body: LOOK AT MY NAME I LOVE TEEMO I AM TEEMO IRL LIKE GOSU IS VAYNE IRL {{champion:17}} {{champion:67}}
Nice ! This shows it takes skill to use teemo and still have fun.
So does anyone know how to contact Riot about this ?
I really want the snowman Teemo~~~!!! PLEASE ~!

that's one was preety hard to get. as part of snowdown 2013 (I think) it required you to do a few things. the only teemo icons I don't have is the one where he is wearing the mask and the one where he is dancing in a shower of petals.
Dancing in a shower of petals ? how to get that ?
I didn't know how else to explain it. but I'm talking about this http://imgur.com/l3UO4Tg

I sympathise with Jhin and his quote for when he kills Teemo:
"I like the way you die boy!"

Teemo is only acceptable in his Omega squad skin.
just like Yi is only acceptable in his PROJECT: skin
'my tears have all dried up kid'
there is a special place in hell for people like you
